outputs.output_descr: A comprehensive review of the national UNV volunteer modality conducted, within the context of UNV's corporate efforts to realign itslef with its evolved mandate and Business Model.  Review findings / recommendations will directly input into UNV's revision of the modality with a view of enhancing the added value and role of the NUNV volunteer mechanism in promoting national and local volunteerism in addressing development challenges.

project_descr: The project aims to enhance the added value of the national UN Volunteer modality through review and revision of the guidance note, volunteer management arrangements and Conditions of Service for national UN Volunteers
